dashboardWelcome: Welcome to Har Kun ecosystem! Manage your daily activities and spiritual practices in one place.
streakMessage: Keep up the good work! You're on a 7-day streak.
tasbeehDescription: Count your daily dhikr, check prayer times, and view the Islamic calendar.
shareDescription: This will share your current dhikr statistics as a message in the selected chat.
prayerGuideDescription: A simple guide to performing the Islamic prayer (Salah).
prayerStep2: Step 2: Face the Qibla (direction of the Kaaba)
prayerStep4: Step 4: Say Takbir (Allahu Akbar) and begin prayer
prayerStep5: Step 5: Follow the proper sequence of standing, bowing, and prostrating
unableToLoadPrayerTimes: Unable to load prayer times. Please try again later.
hisobDescription: Track your finances, calculate zakat, and manage charitable donations.
mashgulotDescription: Plan and track your daily activities and physical exercises.
talimDescription: Access educational materials, courses, and learning resources.
taonomaDescription: Discover healthy recipes, meal plans, and nutritional guidance.
kutubxonaDescription: Browse and read Islamic books and other literature.
intizomDescription: Organize your tasks, habits, and daily routines.
tabobatDescription: Track your health and medications, and find wellness resources.
fayllarDescription: Store and manage your important files and documents.
